abstract: The Swiss bank said Sergio P. Ermotti, who has run UBS on an interim basis since September, would become permanent chief executive and take the reins of a strategic restructuring.
snippet: The Swiss bank said Sergio P. Ermotti, who has run UBS on an interim basis since September, would become permanent chief executive and take the reins of a strategic restructuring.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — UBS has chosen Sergio P. Ermotti, who has run the Swiss bank on an interim basis since September, to become its permanent chief executive.

headline.main: UBS Names Sergio Ermotti as Chief Executive
